meanings.definition: The quality of being agile and graceful in movement.
meanings.sent1: Her lissomenesses on the dance floor captivated everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's lissomenesses were evident in her flawless routine.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the lissomenesses of the ballerina, but ended up in a funny tumble.
meanings.sent4: His lissomenesses in dodging the obstacles was like a leaf floating on a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The swan glided across the water with such lissomenesses that it seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: The state of being flexible and supple.
meanings.sent1: Yoga helps improve the lissomenesses of the body.
meanings.sent2: The contortionist's lissomenesses amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The rubber band showed off its lissomenesses by stretching to its limit.
meanings.sent4: Her mind had the lissomenesses to adapt to any situation effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The acrobat's lissomenesses allowed her to bend and twist in unbelievable ways.

meanings.definition: The ability to move with ease and fluidity.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah's lissomenesses enabled it to chase down its prey swiftly.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's lissomenesses made every step look effortless.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to mimic human lissomenesses but ended up looking clumsy.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed with the lissomenesses of a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's lissomenesses were unmatched on the track.
